name: Mirza
description: Mirza is a body text typeface based on the Naskh script, with 4 different weights. The design aims to observe the rules of Arabic and Persian aesthetics with the help of ligatures. Mirza includes a Latin typeface designed in harmony with the Arabic, to make it useful for multilingual texts. The Mirza project is led by KB Studio, a design studio in Los Angeles. To contribute, see github.com/Tarobish/Mirza
author: KB Studio
